document.full_text: using the shuttle's robotic arm, endeavour's astronauts will scrutinize a gouge on the shuttle's underbelly with a high-resolution camera and a laser attached to a boom.
document.title: science: shuttle crew to take close look at damaged heat tile
lines_and_colors: using the shuttle's robotic arm, endeavour's astronauts will scrutinize a gouge on the shuttle's underbelly with a high-resolution camera and a laser attached to a boom.
